main event: An unidentified aerial object was sighted over Miles City, Arkansas, with reports from several witnesses describing it as oval-shaped and silvery, moving rapidly across the sky.
interesting points: The object was reported as being about the size of a car., The witnesses included Mr. and Mrs. Homan and a police officer who briefly observed the object., The object glided silently and had no visible means of propulsion., The object was observed for about two minutes before disappearing from view., Multiple residents reported sightings of strange objects across the city during the same time frame.
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. Homan, local residents, and Patrolman Dave Kiley.
